name: Tiny Hunks Bro Sk8er 1
description:
Tiny Hunk's Bro Sk8er: that's sk8 m8!

The definitive skating experience. Do tricks, go up ramps, go down ramps, don't touch your bro!

Made for Millie. Happy Birthday Millie, suhdude.

CONTROLS:

wasd - skate

mouse/trackpad - camera

Alternatively, use ps4 joysticks!

CREDITS

A Game by Harry 

Industrial Warehouse Props by Robert Ramsay: https://www.robertramsay.co.uk/ 

If you Must by Del the Funky Homosapien

Ace of Spades by MotorHead

Not the Same by Bodyjar

Skating invented by Tony Hawks

Title invented by my flatmate Amy

Birthday  by Millie (happy birthday)
